评论详情: Lightweight and very comfortable. Unfortunately broke down after about 2 years.

The pictures of the wallet are after 7 continuous years of use. It's very sturdy, went through the wash on multiple occasions, and held up very well. It's super slim, so it doesn't bother me to sit on it. I just bought the exact same one to replace this because the corners were tearing a little bit, but I feel I got my money's worth and then some.

评论概述: Almost ten years oldi and still holding up (bought Dec 2014)
评论详情: I’ve had the Flowfold bifold wallet for almost 10 years. It has been my favorite wallet ever since. I keep 5-6 cards plus a drivers license and cash in it. Still folds flat and fits in my front pocket without bulges. Durable, stitching is still intact, relatively inexpensive, recycled sail cloth is cool. Small business. I’m kind of surprised it’s not more popular compared To the other old-school/new school weird wallet. I hate the thick leather ones or the metal card keepers. Bulge city.

I bought this as a Christmas gift for my daughter. She has one exactly like it that she has had for years. She loves it and does not want a different one. Honestly her old one is fine just a little frayed, but I wanted to get her a new one!!

评论概述: Over 8 years old and still going strong!
评论详情: I have owned a Flowfold wallet for over 8 years and it is still intact and strong. Its rugged. It’s light. It holds all my cards and cash and is comfortable to carry. You can sit on it, bend it, put it through the wash, spill your food on it, sweat all over it, or do whatever you want with it because this thing is tougher than Captain America’s shield.
It's slim, lightweight, strong and I feel very good looking.
I’ve been a fan of the flowfold wallets and credit card holders for a few years now. They last a long time, they’re thin, lightweight and look different. What’s not to like?
This is my second wallet from this company. I like that it's thin and doesn't absorb sweat
Great wallet
Light weight and holds a lot, ordered one for my husband and a friend, they both like them.

Best wallet I’ve ever owned.  Very unique.  Very thin and light.  It is holding the same number of cards and cash as my previous wallet and it is about half the thickness.I added an 8 page vinyl card/picture insert for extra card capacity.  That is working out nicely.
Amazingly light. Can hardly tell it’s in my pocket.

Wallet: Useful; Durable: Attractive; Minimalistic.  My only note is that the material is transparent in spots making the outer bill in the billfold visible from the outside. This isn't necessarily a problem.

评论概述: This product has few features and seems insubstantial.
评论详情: I have another sailcloth wallet that I've used for years.  This product has few features and seems insubstantial.  Not very pleased based on prior products and my expectations.

Damn it this wallet is cool!  It weights nothing, and holds everything  I need.  My ID cards, a credit card, room for business cards and plenty of room for cash.  And you don't even notice it in your pocket.  Wonderful!

评论概述: Great company making great products keep up the good work
评论详情: This is my second flowfold product I also own the single pocket card case. They are both high quality durable products. I'm sure I'll be ordering more in the future ! Wish I could get my hands on one of thier back packs but they've been out of stock . Great company making great products keep up the good work !
Nice, thin, lightweight wallet with plenty of pockets for the 8 cards i regularly carry .  Doesn't look like it's going to stretch out, but I will update if it does.

评论概述: other than that it's great, however the fact that it is "see-through" and ...
评论详情: Only drastic flaw is that it is transparent and your ca$h can be seen by ALL, not exactly what I had in mind, other than that it's great, however the fact that it is "see-through" and everyone can see my money when I pull it out, might as well have a money clip..

评论概述: Best wallet I have ever owned and will only ever use
评论详情: The only wallet that I will ever use. This is the best wallet I have ever owned. I had my last one for over two years and it still looked brand new! The only reason I had to order another one was because I lost my wallet. I went with the green this time for something different. I am hard on wallets and this wallet takes it and never shows signs of wear. I love the layout, the thin-ness, durability, construction, and as a bonus alot of people say “cool Wallet” if you are even considering ordering this do yourself a favor and order it now!
Very easy to carry. Can hardly feel it in my pocket.  Edit: over a year of use and it still looks new. Great wallet.

评论概述: I ran across an add in the Sierra Club magazine as a great Father's Day gift
评论详情: I actually never heard of this company before. . .I ran across an add in the Sierra Club magazine as a great Father's Day gift.  I'm actually buying it as a gift for someone who loves to sail and being that the material it is made of is derived from real sails, I thought it would be fitting.  I can't wait to give the gift!
Only wallet I’ll ever use now.
I have had many compliments. Unique wallet, and that is exactly what I was looking for!
Only had it a short time .  Great fit, feel , and design!  Material creased after throwin some change in it and then putting in my pocket.  Hope it withstands the test of time.

Excellent wallet and great for minimalists. I've only had it a month or so, but it's super thin (complaints about piping are overblown). The card slots are pretty tight, but fine for maybe five things each side, which is more than enough. The bill fold is on the narrow side and wouldn't work with larger currency, but that's not really an issue with me.
Great quality of materials, but if you're filling a lot of cards in this, it seems like it may try to bend them over time.
I've had this wallet for a couple years and it's still going strong. No complaints.
Love my new wallet!  Quality construction, thinner than any wallet I've ever owned and therefore almost unnoticeable in my pocket.
Awesome wallet! Lost my other one, so why change whats awesome!

Pretty good! was worried after reading reviews that it wouldnt fit my cards but it was fine. 2 modifications im thinking of: the Flowfold tag is in a weird spot on the inside, so im probably gonna have to cut that out. because of how it was sewn i guess it has a tendency to open up slightly if i set it down. not  fully open and it doesn't otherwise affect the wallet but im probably am going to add velcro to keep it closed.

I've had this wallet for about a year now and it's held up very nicely. I've gotten several compliments on it and the fact that its sailcloth makes me feel closer to the water. Only reason for 4 stars is due to a lack of card slots (4 slots)
I want to buy one of these for everyone I know!  Great product and a first class company.  I am very impressed.  Thank you, Flowfold!

评论概述: Lightweight, Durable, Thin, Best wallet ever owned.
评论详情: I bought this wallet 3 years ago, I use it everyday and I can't believe how good this wallet is. No Rips No, Cracks, Stitching is in perfect condition, Well made.  I think this wallet will last a lifetime.

评论概述: Overall a good product. Design could be slightly modified to either ...
评论详情: Overall a good product. Design could be slightly modified to either be slightly narrower making it more ideal for front pocket use. Or slightly wider for international travel.
And I find it easier around the house being white!

I got this as a gift.  One of the best wallets I have ever used!  Very slim, forced me to get rid of a lot of the unneeded junk in my wallet, but still plenty of room for the essentials.I've used mine for about 1 year, and no visible wear so far.  My complaint with leather wallets in this price range were their durability.  Always felt like I needed to get a new one even with regular cleaning/conditioning.  Sail cloth so far seems invincible!Only complaint is that the material is semi-transparent.  You can see the bills though the wallet.  If I were a richer man I would be concerned that prying eyes would be spying my c-notes, but typically only having smaller bills there it is not too big of a problem for me!
Great material used...tough...durable ..water/floats..not 100% dry, but cash will dry in sun..Great Idea!!

absolutely love this wallet. perfect size, love the look and feel of it. only thing that i believe was mentioned that isnt true is. i was under the impression that the card slots in the wallet wouldn't stretch out. meaning if you have 5 or 6 cards in there for a while, if you took them out and only had 1 it would still fit snug. which isnt the case. now it doesn't stretch nearly as much as the wallets i've used in the past and it still holds 1 card without falling out. so im happy. if i lost this today i would buy another one tomorrow.  build quality is top notch. no stitches are coming loose there were no threads poking out when i got it or now. this might be the perfect wallet depending on what you are looking for .

评论概述: Best wallet I've ever used in 35 years.
评论详情: My wife and kids think this too trendy for me, I'm 50. I like it a lot, best wallet I've ever owned.

评论概述: Totally in love with this wallet
评论详情: Totally in love with this wallet. Construction and materials seem like it will last forever and it is easy to get my cards in and out of the pockets

The slimfold is slim, but keep in mind that if you insist on packing it up then it'll get fatter, but compared to just the material of my old wallet, it's already way thinner. I do have to admit that I'm not a huge fan of the material they use at the borders. Feels a bit cheap, but that's not a big deal. However, the corners of the wallet were sorta sharp when I got it and ripped up a bunch of my pockets. (I used a lighter to melt down the pointy bits and now it's totally fine). So, a good wallet, but some considerations.
LOVE this wallet. Several friends have commented on it, and I actually bought one more as a gift. When this one dies, get's lost, or grows old I will replace it with this same one. Seriously.
I bought this for my husband last Christmas. After a year of daily use, it still looks brand new. I couldn't be more pleased with the quality or the price that I paid!

Absolutely love this wallet! The construction is great, it's lightweight, and it looks cool. What more could you ask for in a wallet? I have two cards on each side and there's room for more, and the bill compartment is big enough for decent amount of cash. If you'd like to kick the bad habit of stuffing your wallet until it no longer fits in your pocket, this is the perfect solution.  Three year update: This wallet is still going strong and is showing no noticeable wear, none, it's borderline amazing.
this wallet is thinner than i expected. its still skinnier than my old wallet when empty!

评论概述: Get rid of the George Kastanza wallet!
评论详情: Very slim and forces you to keep only what is needed.  I'm very glad I ditched my thick leather wallet for this.  My brother has had one for years with no issues!
not a good item
Slim and lightweight, can hold everything I need

评论概述: Good looking and I barely notice it in my pocket
评论详情: Very thin and lightweight. Good looking and I barely notice it in my pocket. I would buy it again.

Cool wallet. Slim and durable. I hate thick wallets and this one fit the bill.....  I have received more compliments regarding this wallet than any other that I have owned.  I fit 6 cards plus my work badge, and it does not bulge at all. Also fits a lot of bills nicely. Good work guys.
I always had a pretty bulky wallet, but this one lets me keep most of what I need inside and still remains super thin! Was deciding between this and a money clip and am very happy with my choice.

Great thin wallet. Seems really durable, yet still super thin and light. It's replacing my Koyono X Slimmy which was starting to come apart at the seams. I'd really recommend either wallet though, it just depends on your needs.
Wallet is exactly what I was looking for. Super thin fits great in my front pocket and still has room for all my stuff. It is built really well and doesn't feel like it's going to fall apart.

Better than expected.  Minimalist, yet, roomy enough for 8 credit/ ID cards.  Love the use materials and finishes- why are we still putting chemically treated leather things in our pockets?  I've tried all kinds of wallets; leather, cork, and tyvek, this is my favorite one yet.
I've had this in my pocket every day now, for the last 7 months. It is light, durable and thin.  Probably the best wallet I've ever owned. If it ever wears out, I'll definitely be getting another.

I loved it until it was lost/stolen after a few months. I got the white color so my wallet stands out and it can be easily looked for, it does feel nicer and more comfortable to carry vs my old classic leather wallet, just do not carry any coins in it or it loses its slimliness and it hurts to wear as the coins bulge through. The material is excellent and is built to last, so long as it doesn't get lost/stolen...
Slim and roomy. Barely notice it in my pocket with 7 cards and half dozen Jackson notes. Superb quality, piece of art.
Great light weight can't tell it's in my pocket great material would recommend to friends
Cool looking wallet and 3 times as thin as my regular wallet.

评论概述: So thin that you're left with a feeling that it is paper garbage. However
评论详情: This wallet is shockingly thin when you first open it. So thin that you're left with a feeling that it is paper garbage. However, it fits my belongings nicely and if it holds up, I'll be pleasantly surprised.

评论概述: Light, Thin and Made from Recycled Material.
评论详情: So my trusty old billfold I've had for about 3 millennia was looking a bit worse for wear and it was "suggested" in a not so subtle way by my significant other that I should replace it.  Because "if that ratty thing is on the counter again, I'm going to throw it away". And the search began.  I've always had a leather wallet or some form of money clip.  But, I'm a man of means these days and if improvement can be wrought from simple every day items then I'm all for it.  Enter my dear older brother who just purchased one of these fantastic wallets from the good old Amazon mother ship.  After holding it and inspecting it for a few minutes I was sold!  Light, thin, nearly indestructible?  AND it's made from recycled racing sails?  Sign me up!The zombie apocalypse may come, but I'm sleeping soundly knowing my wallet will survive.
Super tough, and I like that I can get a bit of a view into the billfold...
Really cool concept, durable design, and stays thin with plenty in it

My first impression of this wallet is very good. I need a slim wallet that wont fall apart and this seems to be it. I got the white and black one and it looks great, feels great, fits in skinny pants pocket great. Small cons: makes some minor crumple noises when you open and close it and you can kind of see the bills in the part that holds bills.
well made, thin and easy to carry.

评论概述: Great if you're looking for a simple slimline wallet that ...
评论详情: Great if you're looking for a simple slimline wallet that can still expand to hold a fat stack of cash.  Lightweight but tough materials and good quality construction.

评论概述: and the smoothness makes it easy to pull out of a pocket
评论详情: This is my new EDC wallet.  Fits my ID, 4 credit cards, 3 bank cards, 2 medical insurance cards, and a metro pass.  Very slim profile, and the smoothness makes it easy to pull out of a pocket.  Could be either a front or a back pocket wallet.
Love it. It's well made and it floats. Witch is a huge bonus because I'm sailing around the Caribbean

评论概述: I like it, and my right butt cheek agrees when ...
评论详情: Amazon asks what I think of this wallet, I like it, and my right butt cheek agrees when I sit down. It is very thin and light weight, the two most important factors per reference above, much more so than the "thin and light" leather issue it replaced. The high tech looks and strength are a plus, and the fact that it floats is good to know as I spend a lot of time on the water. I was also gratified to learn, after the fact, this clever use of sail cloth was the innovation of some sailors from Peaks Island, Maine, my home state, carrying on a long tradition of resourcefulness. I would recommend this product.

评论概述: This is a great wallet. If I had it to do over ...
评论详情: This is a great wallet.  If I had it to do over I would have picked a darker color, since you can see the currency.  Everyone can see what is in mine, right through the wallet. You know the commercial where they say "What's in your wallet?"?  There is no need to ask.

评论概述: I've really fallen in love with this wallet
评论详情: I've really fallen in love with this wallet, and I get a lot of compliments on it. I keep a colored paper in the bill pocket, otherwise you can see through to the denomination of the last bill. security and a little color!

评论概述: The last wallet you will ever need!
评论详情: Excellent wallet. Lightweight. Strong. Durable. Thin. Plenty of necessary room for all the essentials. The absolute last wallet you will ever need.

I love this wallet. It may be designed for men, but I was looking for something thin and lightweight for running around doing errands without having to carry an overloaded pocketbook. This fits the bill -- sorry about the unintended pun. There's room for an ID, a couple of credit or debit cards, and a number of bills. I like the fact that it's made of recycled sailcloth. The design is very attractive, too. An excellent product.
Support made in America!! Floats and is durable

评论概述: it is much more comfortable and compact than nylon
评论详情: Has to be the lightest, thinnest wallet around!  For those trying to avoid leather, it is much more comfortable and compact than nylon, which has no give.

评论概述: Better than expected. Durable and thin.
评论详情: Outstanding product. I was concerned that the sail material would not be durable, and that it would ultimately crack along the wallet seam or elsewhere. Not so. It's tough as nails. I did not buy this because of wanting a slim wallet, but I was shocked at how much thinner my loaded wallet was that my old Tumi, which was pretty svelte to begin with.
Bought this for my stepdad who is a big sailing enthusiast for his birthday (January) and he uses it everyday and has never said a poor thing about it, it was JUST what he wanted

I chose this wallet because of it's durability and and ability to handle getting wet. Great design, simple, functional. I would definitely recommend this wallet for anyone with an active, outdoor lifestyle.

My chiropractor nagged me into getting a front pocket wallet.  This one fit the bill.  Extremely light.  Fits about 4 credit/membership cards, 2 IDs,a few various other items (concealed carry and atv permits) and 5-6 bills.  All that and it is still very slim and hardly noticeable in the front pocket.
Quite a bit slimmer than any others I have had. Goes in the pocket easily. Will buy one for son also.
It really isnt a traditional wallet, but it is just what I was looking for. I have had it almost a week and it is great. It is slim and seems really durable. I would recommend this to anyone.
Great product very strong and durable I know those are the same thing but whatever I just like it a lot
Best wallet I've ever owned. Very light but very we'll-made and rugged. Made from repurposed racing sail material. Carries just what you need.
Even lighter than I expected; extremely thin.  Appears to be well-made.  I am able to put six plastic cards in the wallet; slightly tight fit.
Perfect !
